title: Roland Martin Interview and More
itunes:title: Roland Martin Interview and More
description:
Wednesday 5/31- Today on the show we had journalist and host from TV One, Roland Martin come by where he expressed taking ownership, educating the youth and more. Also, after a failed attempt to be funny from a gruesome anti-Trump photo shoot, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to comedian Kathy Griffin. Moreover, Angela Yee also helped our listeners with some life and relationship advice during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
